attributes.action: Dig up all motorways and convert them for off road trials and use by 4x4s which will be banned from other roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Successs with this petition will enable 4x4 drivers to practice the driving skills for their vehicles when they take them abroad for use on African safaris.
Removing them from other roads will reduce traffic pollution and congestion

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
